body_content.explanation: an expression of sadness or disappointment, especially when there is no hope that a situation will change:
examples: I love football but, alas, I have no talent as a player.
"Will you be able to come tomorrow?" "Alas, no."

body_content.explanation: an expression of great sadness or disappointment:
examples: Alas and alack, he will not help me.
Alack and alas, the food was spoiled.
Alas and alack, nobody at that time had the job of fact-checking the statements of state officials.
He tried to behave, but alas and lack, he ended up back in prison.
Alack and alas, the restaurant owner turned down my request.
